short_summary: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below
description:
The delivery is requested at CFB Esquimalt and CFB Halifax.
Item 1, GSIN: 4610, NSN: 01-022-9970, CARTRIDGE, WATER DEMINERALIZER, ION EXCHANGE
Part No.: 255340-401, NCAGE: 74YZ3
Quantity: 150, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Esquimalt.

Item 2, GSIN: 4610, NSN: 01-022-9970, CARTRIDGE, WATER DEMINERALIZER, ION EXCHANGE
Part No.: 255340-401, NCAGE: 74YZ3
Quantity: 250, Unit of Issue: EA, to be delivered to CFB Halifax.

Bidders proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the brand name and model and/or Part Number and the NCAGE they are offering.

Bidders must submit prices in Canadian dollars. Bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.

The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
full_summary:
**Title (English):** Cartridge, Water Demineralizer, Ion Exchange
**Title (French):** Cartouche, déminéralisateur d'eau, échange d'ions

**Reference Number:** cb-8365-58240064
**Solicitation Number:** W8482-241973/A
**Closing Date:** October 3, 2023, 14:00:00 EST

The Department of National Defence has issued a Request for Proposal to procure the following items:

* Item #1: Water Demineralizer Cartridges ( Ion Exchange)
	+ Quantity: 150 units
	+ Unit of issue: Each
	+ Destination: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Esquimalt
* Item #2: Water Demineralizer Cartridges ( Ion Exchange)
	+ Quantity: 250 units
	+ Unit of issue: Each
	+ Destination: Canadian Forces Base (CFB) Halifax

**Notice Details:**

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Traditional
* **Selection Criteria:** The proposal with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price will be selected.
* **Notice URL:** https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8365/rfp-w8482-241973-a.en.pdf (English)

**Contract Details:**

* **Contracting Entity:** Directorate Maritime Procurement
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 101 Colonel by Drive, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
* **Contact Person:** Jean-Pierre Normandin
* **Contact Information:** jean-pierre.normandin@forces.gc.ca, (819) 939-3674

**Important Notes:**

* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Prices must be submitted in Canadian dollars; bids submitted in foreign currency will be rejected.
* The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.‎
* Any Equivalent or Substitute Product must be clearly indicated by the bidders.‎
* Bidders must submit a valid and current NCAGE code.‎‎‎igospackage Attachment

Please note that the rewritten entry is in English. If you need a French version, you will have to be diligent and translate all the pieces of the entry except for the title and the notice details section as it has already been translated.

To provide further assurance of understanding, the amount of work expected in this response is
